Posts.Content: I am HER2 Pos., ER + 30% & PR Pos 20%, Grade 2, Tumor was 4.5 cm. Im am 38. I am waiting on the cancer treatment center to call to set up my initial appt. but the waiting is so stressfull. I would at least like to know what treatment I will possibly be looking at.
Posts.Title: Need opinions on what type of treatment you think I may have to do
